mapper.select: select skav.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(skav.sale_attr_value_id order by ssav.base_sale_attr_id SEPARATOR '|') as value_ids from sku_sale_attr_value skav inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on skav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id where skav.spu_id = #{spuId} and skav.is_deleted = 0 group by skav.sku_id;
